eu_initiatives: Development of Unions Customs Code, Reform of Dual Use O, international  FTA´s  and -Trade Facilitation Agreement-, non tariff trade barriers-, Balkan-Partnership-Program

DIHK-sequa-Projekts for enhancement of economic development in the  Western Balkan-Region.

goals__remit:
We are one of the leading German trade compliance experts, advising international companies in the fields of customs, taxes, compliance, logistics and trade.  
Our team is consisting of experienced and highly qualified customs and trade specialists (business lawyers and graduated customs experts). 
Our target is to evaluate the individual needs of our internationally operating customers in order to provide customer-specific solutions for all challenges in international trade.  
In the spirit of our mission, we act with high expertise, empathy and flexibility to meet our customers´ requirements.  
Our mission is to develop practical solutions and to implement them in the companies´ processes as well as to enable our customers to increase their profits by better international competitiveness and entering new regions with their products and services. 
 
Our Trade Compliance Solutions (consultancy) covers: 
EU market access, market analyzes, sales promotion 
International export control (US law included) 
Origin and preferences (EU, CEFTA, SAP, ASEAN, NAFTA, PEM…) 
Classification of goods 
Special customs procedures (processing, customs warehousing ...) 
Special features of the Unions Customs Code and WCO (World Customs Organization) 
Process analysis, descriptions, workflows as well as their practical implementation 
Organization of serial transactions and complex delivery relationships 
Introduction of IT solutions for internal process optimization 
Process and personnel analyzes to optimize human resources, workflow management and process engineering 
AEO authorization: auditing, support and monitoring 
Regular auditing / validation of trade processes 
Supervision, evaluation and implementation of customs audits 
"Trouble Shooting": 
Conflict resolution with public authorities 
Conception of official objections and statements on imminent criminal and fine proceedings 
Application for reimbursement requests 
 
Seminars / Trainings / Workshops: 
Trade organization and Trade processing: 
Internal customs and trade organization 
Special customs procedures (customs warehouses, processing, usage ...) 
Preparation for audits and monitoring 
Internal Customs Expert - the link between customs and business 
AEO - the seal of approval of your company and basis for most trade simplifications 
Export control, export and EU trade: 
UCC - The comprehensive European customs law, to be adopted by EU-member candidates 
Export Control / Internal Compliance Program (ICP); Structure, organization, necessity, risks 
ECCN classification including the basic principles of US export control law 
Complex foreign trade with the following focus: 
Cross-company stores 
consignment stock 
Brokering and trans-trading transactions 
Preferences and Customs Classification of goods 
Identification, Determination and Use of origin and preferences: 
Saving potential and securing competitive advantages in worldwide trade, including  “Cumulation-” and “Drawback-”regulations 
Classification of goods / Tariffing: 
The basis for im- and exports 
 
Gateway to EU:  
The “All-In-One” Solutions for your market access 
Companies planning to enter new markets have to comply to regional and local regulations, meet special demands of the government and authorities and must evaluate all criteria of the target market : 
Local registrations (Tax, Customs, etc.) 
Market analysis 
Chances and challenges of the new target market 
Customs regulations: Trade barriers, procedures and formalities, origin and preferential advantages 
Cost savings by the use of customs/tax simplifications at the time of import in the target market 
Saving time and money by optimizing logistic and storage processes 
Best expertise and experience, certified as  Germans “Top Consultant” in the category “excellent management consultant” 
Best networked via our international partnerships and our close contacts to governments and officials 
Unique service “Gateway to EU”
